hero.paragraph: I craft software and web solutions that allow small business owners to modernize their operations and automate manual tasks

expertise.name: Web Development
expertise.paragraph: I build responsive and intuitive progressive web applications that allow businesses and individuals to provide unique solutions within their industries for internal or commercial use. I build full-stack solutions that incorporate robust database solutions, performant backend systems that make use of any external or internal systems required, and responsive front-end implementations. All solutions are built to be deployable to any environment.

expertise.name: Custom Software
expertise.paragraph: I build cloud, desktop, and IoT solutions that allow businesses and individuals to streamline their operations and facilitate growth within their domain. From self-contained systems that perform a set of tasks independently to systems that work with your other existing services, I build robust and scalable solutions that will meet your requirements and use case.

expertise.name: Android Development
expertise.paragraph: I develop native mobile applications that allow businesses and individuals to gain a competitive edge within their industries, whether it is an internal system to be used within your organization or a commercial application to serve your audience, I will build out solutions that meet your needs.

services.name: Programming
services.paragraph: An expert in Object Oriented Programming and Functional Programming, I use modern programming languages like C#, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python along with technologies like .NET and NodeJS to write custom code that performs bespoke functions, communicates with external services and/or connects to databases, etc.

services.name: Database Design
services.paragraph: Using my advanced knowledge of database modeling and implementation, I design and implement database solutions that meet performance, capacity, security, and cost requirement using SQL databases or NoSQL databases like MongoDB, Firebase, and Firestore.

services.name: Cloud Development
services.paragraph: Using a cloud-native approach for development, I incorporate DevOps principles to produce solutions that can be deployed using different cloud strategies independent of the cloud provider. I can achieve this through the use of containerization with Docker and orchestration with Kubernetes along with my expertise with Git and different repository hosting and DevOps platforms like Azure DevOps, GitLabs, BitBucket, and GitHub.

services.name: Frontend Implementation
services.paragraph: Using my expertise with different platforms, I will implement robust front-end designs from custom UI designs I created or any designs supplied. My experience with HTML, CSS, Angular, and Blazor allows me to implement responsive component-based web front-ends, while my knowledge of WPF, XAML, and Android Studio XML allows me to implement solutions for desktop and android respectively.

services.name: User Interface Design
services.paragraph: Using my advanced knowledge of Figma and other editing tools, I create custom UI/UX designs for websites, web applications, and mobile applications packaged in easy-to-navigate visual prototypes. Additionally, I build custom icon packs and recreate logos and branding for use in front-end implementation.

industry_header.paragraph: I have worked with clients from various industries within Africa and Europe, gaining a broader view of common issues faced across the business landscape as well as learning about the intricacies of the different industries and how technology is implemented.
